description.original: Collapse sidebars when clicking on the editor/viewer panel
description.translation: 点击编辑器/查看面板时收起侧边栏。

dict..setDesc(\"Click on the blank area of ri: .setDesc("点击丝带的空白区域以展开侧边栏。")
dict..setDesc(\"Click on the note title to ex: .setDesc("点击笔记标题以展开左侧边栏。")
dict..setDesc(\"Add a pin that can temporaril: .setDesc("添加一个可以临时锁定侧边栏折叠的图钉。")
